events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred at an intersection, requesting to file a claim immediately.
The claim was categorized under auto accident due to keywords indicating a vehicle collision from the report.
An agent specializing in auto accidents was assigned to handle the customer's case to ensure prompt processing.
Acknowledgement of receipt of the auto accident claim has been sent to the customer, outlining next steps.
Request sent to the customer for photos of the vehicle damage and the police report documenting the collision.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including detailed images of the damaged car and the accident report.
Investigation has begun to assess the extent of the damage and verify the information provided in the claim documents.
The investigation concluded successfully, confirming the details of the auto accident and assessing claim validity.
A settlement offer based on repair estimates and liability was proposed and sent to the customer for review.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the communication.
Following agreement on the settlement terms, the auto accident claim was formally approved for payment.
Payment for the approved auto accident claim was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s bank account.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed after payment issuance and final confirmation from the customer.
All files and correspondence related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and audit.
